description: The Audi RS 6 is a high-performance variant of the Audi A6 range.
The Audi S5 is the high-performance variant of Audi's A5.
The Audi R8 is a mid-engine, 2-seater sports car.
The Volkswagen Passat is a large family car manufactured and marketed by Volkswagen since 1973.
The Volkswagen Golf is a compact car produced by the German automotive manufacturer Volkswagen since 1974.
The Volkswagen Polo is a car produced by the German manufacturer Volkswagen since 1975.
